org.tms.api.io

Interface StyleableIOOption<T extends StyleableIOOption<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of BaseIOOptions in this StyledPageIOOptions
    All Superinterfaces:
    BaseIOOption<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TitleableIOOption<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DOCOptions, org.tms.io.options.FormattedPageIOOptions, HTMLOptions, PDFOptions, RTFOptions, org.tms.io.options.StyledPageIOOptions, org.tms.io.options.TitledPageIOOptions, XLSOptions

    public interface StyleableIOOption<T extends StyleableIOOption<T>>
extends BaseIOOption<T>
    An BaseIOOptions where the output can be Styled. Style elements that are supported include:
    • column widths,
    • row label column widths,
    • table cell value font size,
    • heading font size, and
    • font family.
    All widths and sizes are in pixels, unless otherwise noted.

    Note: StyleableIOOption methods only affect export operations.

    Since:
    "1.1"
    Version:
    "1.1"

      int getDefaultColumnWidth()
      Return the default column width, in pixels, used to display Column data.
      int getDefaultFontSize()
      Return the default font size, in pixels, used to display table cell data in exports.
      String getFontFamily()
      Returns the font family used to generate the table output in the exported file.
      int getHeadingFontSize()
      Return the font size used to display row and column labels, in pixels.
      int getRowLabelColumnWidth()
      The default width, in pixels, used to display the column where Row labels are displayed in the exported file.

      Set the default width, in inches, used to display table column data in exports

      • getFontFamily

        String getFontFamily()
        Returns the font family used to generate the table output in the exported file. Allowable values are file format-dependent and must refer to font names that are defined/native in the file format.
        Returns:
        the font family used to generate the table output in the exported file

      • withFontFamily

        T withFontFamily(String fontFamily)
        Sets the font family used to display table data in exports. The font family is expressed as the string name of the font, as it appears or is represented in the native export format. For example, to use the font "Chalkboard" in MS Word, fontFamily is set to "Chalkboard".

        Note that TMS does not provide any font family name translation services; it is the responsibility of the caller to specify a correct value for each export format.

        Parameters:
        fontFamily - the name of the font family used to display table data in exports
        Returns:
        a new T with the font family size set
